items.title: California downpours ease but flood and mudslide risks linger
items.description: Even modest additional rainfall could trigger floods and mudslides in saturated areas, forecasters warn.

items.title: US judge blocks detention of British social media campaigner
items.description: Imran Ahmed was among five people accused of seeking to "coerce" US firms into censoring free speech.

items.title: Israel recognises Somaliland as independent state, Netanyahu says
items.description: The decision has been condemned by Somalia, Egypt, Turkey and Djibouti, who call it a dangerous precedent.

items.title: US launches strikes against Islamic State in Nigeria
items.description: President Trump has previously accused the Nigerian government of failing to protect Christians from jihadists.

items.title: Zelensky plans to meet Trump on Sunday for talks on ending Russian war
items.description: The Ukrainian leader says he will see the US president in Florida and believes "a lot can be decided before the new year".
